title: 自动重启
author: Lexus0v0
txt_content: 怎么写一个bat文件做到服务器崩溃自动重启，请上传文件

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
[url=home.php?mod=space&uid=39305]@echo[/url] OFF
:head
set a=-1
:start
set /a a+=1
set b=3
color 3
title Server [已重新启动 %a% 次]
java -Xmx8G -Xms2G -jar CatServer.jar 
ping -n %b% 127.1>nul
goto start复制代码

https://c-t.work/s/f19a6935626e41

java -Xmx8G -Xms2G -jar CatServer.jar  这一行改成你的启动参数

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 屑🥕 于 2020-6-21 18:34 编辑 
@echo OFF
:head
set a=-1
:start
set /a a+=1
set b=3
color 7
title Survival/Resource Server  [已重新启动 %a% 次] -
java -Xmx4G -Xms128M -XX:+UseG1GC -XX:+UnlockExperimentalVMOptions -XX:MaxGCPauseMillis=100 -XX:+DisableExplicitGC -XX:TargetSurvivorRatio=90 -XX:G1MaxNewSizePercent=60 -XX:G1NewSizePercent=40 -XX:G1MixedGCLiveThresholdPercent=35 -XX:+AlwaysPreTouch -XX:+ParallelRefProcEnabled -Dusing.aikars.flags=mcflags.emc.gs -XX:+UseLargePagesInMetaspace -jar CatServer-8cf55c8-universal.jar
ping -n %b% 127.1>nul
goto start复制代码

复制粘贴在文本文档里 后缀.txt改成.bat就行了
